name: baked-chicken-wings
description: We oven-bake tender chicken wings slowly until the skin is crisp and the meat is juicy. The wings are prepped with a tasty rub of salt, garlic powder, paprika, and savory herbs, so that they're extra delicious. Great for kids or casual get-togethers, these wings make perfect party food.

name: vegetables-cutlery-salad
description: DELICIOUS SALAD & VEGETABLE SEASONING | When your favorite recipe calls for vegetable broth or bouillon, reach for easy-to-use, super-flavorful GOYA Salad and Vegetable Seasoning. Goya Salad and Vegetable Seasoning comes as a powder and is excellent as a base for soups; on chicken, meat and rice dishes, and even to make savory gravies. Great flavor, at your fingertips!

name: club sandwich
description: Now, coming to this recipe, there is a particular group of people who made it special for me. There is this small restaurant here in Bahrain, which is one of the oldest (from what I understand) and tucked away in the heart of the business district and theyâ€™re known for their sandwiches, especially, The Club Sandwich.
